mapper.sql: id as id, outbound_id as outboundId, store_code as storeCode, ext_linenum as extLinenum, upc as upc, ext_sku_name as extSkuName, qty as qty, line_price as linePrice, line_amt as lineAmt, full_line_outbound as fullLineOutbound, part_outbound_strategy as partOutboundStrategy, outbound_carton_type as outboundCartonType, mixing_attr as mixingAttr, inv_status as invStatus, inv_type as invType, batch_number as batchNumber, mfg_date as mfgDate, exp_date as expDate, country_of_origin as countryOfOrigin, inv_attr1 as invAttr1, inv_attr2 as invAttr2, inv_attr3 as invAttr3, inv_attr4 as invAttr4, inv_attr5 as invAttr5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_wh_outbound_line ( id, outbound_id , store_code , ext_linenum , upc , ext_sku_name , qty , line_price , line_amt , full_line_outbound , part_outbound_strategy , outbound_carton_type , mixing_attr , inv_status , inv_type , batch_number , mfg_date , exp_date , country_of_origin , inv_attr1 , inv_attr2 , inv_attr3 , inv_attr4 , inv_attr5 ) VALUES ( #{id,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{outboundId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{storeCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{extLinenum,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{upc,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{extSkuName,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{qty,javaType=Long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{linePrice,javaType=Long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{lineAmt,javaType=Long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{fullLineOutbound,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , #{partOutboundStrategy,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{outboundCartonType,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{mixingAttr,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{invStatus,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{invType,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{batchNumber,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{mfgDate,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{expDate,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{countryOfOrigin,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{invAttr1,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{invAttr2,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{invAttr3,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{invAttr4,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{invAttr5,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_wh_outbound_line SET outbound_id = #{outboundId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , store_code = #{storeCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , ext_linenum = #{extLinenum,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , upc = #{upc,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , ext_sku_name = #{extSkuName,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , qty = #{qty,javaType=Long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , line_price = #{linePrice,javaType=Long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , line_amt = #{lineAmt,javaType=Long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , full_line_outbound = #{fullLineOutbound,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , part_outbound_strategy = #{partOutboundStrategy,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , outbound_carton_type = #{outboundCartonType,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , mixing_attr = #{mixingAttr,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , inv_status = #{invStatus,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , inv_type = #{invType,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , batch_number = #{batchNumber,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , mfg_date = #{mfgDate,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , exp_date = #{expDate,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , country_of_origin = #{countryOfOrigin,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , inv_attr1 = #{invAttr1,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , inv_attr2 = #{invAttr2,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , inv_attr3 = #{invAttr3,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , inv_attr4 = #{invAttr4,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , inv_attr5 = #{invAttr5,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
